dcterms:creator: Riccardo Del Gratta
Sara Goggi
Gabriella Pardelli
Nicoletta Calzolari
dcterms:description: The LRE Map is a comprehensive dataset that aggregates metadata about language resources used in NLP research, including corpora, lexicons, tools, and other resources. It collects information from various conferences and provides insights into the evolution and usage of these resources over time.
dcterms:title: LRE Map
